column1: Except as expressly provided in our Certificate of Incorporation shares of Class A Common Stock and Class  Common Stock
have the same rights and privileges and rank equally share ratably and are identical in all respects as to all matters. In the event
any merger consolidation or other business combination requiring the approval of our stockholders entitled to vote thereon
